attributes.action: Guarantee no change in the status of UK citizens living in Europe
attributes.additional_details: There is much fear and uncertainty in a post-Brexit world. We must not forget the U.K citizens who are currently living and working in the E.U.
attributes.background: Keep the rights, benefits, job security, access to healthcare, access to schools, access to all public services, voting rights and freedom of movement within Europe the same as they were before the referendum.
